title: Will AI Rule Human Beings by 2030?
content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) has made significant strides in the last decade, but will it lead to AI ruling human beings by 2030? The debate is intense and multifaceted, involving ethical, technological, and sociopolitical dimensions. The potential of AI to surpass human intelligence raises questions about autonomy, safety, and the future role of humans in a world where AI systems might make critical decisions.
lead: The progress in AI has been both applauded and critiqued. Proponents argue for AI's potential to solve complex global issues, while detractors warn of the grave dangers of uncontrolled AI development. How we approach AI now could determine the shape of our future society.
